chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 13 has the above problem: Good morning, my ordered iPhone arrived today - and I'm completely disappointed. Not only did I get a totally 'battered' phone that's covered in fatty fingerprint smudges, but both camera lenses are smeared from the inside as well. So, I didn't expect this for 400.- What can you suggest? Thank you very much for your help,

Hello Edith, You can find your return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Simply drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. You can find a list of locations here: Before you prepare your return: 1. Follow these instructions on how to return an item: Here 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product 3. Remove any existing protective wrapping or film 4. Pack your product and its accessories according to the tips below How to pack your product: • The box should be sturdy and stable, with your product placed inside so it won't move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a spare label inside in case the original one is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from both inside and out before you ship it. This will protect you in case your product is damaged during transport. Your return is now ready to be dropped off! We'll notify you as soon as it arrives at our facility. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Dear ecomobile

The customer returns the device for replacement 

as the camera lenses are smeared on the inside 

Regards,
Ermelinda from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We will await for the arrival of the parcel. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile

The customer has decided against an exchange and would like to receive a refund

as soon as the parcel has arrived, please initiate the refund 

Regards,
Ermelinda from the Back Care Team

Dear ecomobile

The customer would like a refund 

Regards,
Ermelinda from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Ermelinda Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JH
